wWYP0lbDZIltvXWz43R_Tg.text: It's our 2nd time in here in the last 24 hours.   Definitely going to miss this place when I return back to the states! Their happy hour is unbelievable, too good to be True. And definitely have an oyster stout or a few.   Would recommend this place 10/10. Great service, good tunes, and great oysters. Thanks so much!

OzTv02L7RkwHYoEK_tOLuw.text: Very nice food, also very nice location. The oysters and also other seafood is very fresh and there's a broad choice in the menu.

photos.caption: Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Sesame thuna
Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Lobster salad
Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Daily oysters

rbiWY_rVRHeYZaZ501lbxQ.text: I had a great dinner here and I really recommend White Horse to anyone looking for some great seafood and good service. I had made a booking for a Sunday evening but didn't really need it because the place was empty. I had the razor clams which were delicious, the cured salmon, and the tender stem broccoli. All were very good and I would recommend any of them. Service was great and I had a fantastic dinner before I had to leave the city. If I'm ever back in Edinburgh I'll have to stop by again.

nrD9rl9PTvaNGy62zXYZDg.text: Oysters and drinks were delicious. Especially during the happy hour, M-Thursday (4-6pm).  The only downside is slow service and the fact they forgot the rest of our food order.  If they could have dedicated servers for certain areas so they check on customers and remember to bring out all the food ordered, it could be a 5 star yelp restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

GhK5HdPROjHVagKtJwpbdA.text: Very nice place indeed!  Food was good, like a fish tapas place.  Only concern was the price, if you are hungry avoid this place. If you want have a good time and order a few dishes to for a feel good lunch or dinner go for it

Dc46lMVQH4kaNKoiGnzgjQ.text: Sea food was good it's kinda like sharing plates but it was  definitely overpriced but good customer service was also very good over all would recommend

wDPmpWNZ6PAQ8hEXFClW8A.text: Came back again because the food and service was so wonderful. I was greatly disappointed with the service the second time around. The difference is that the fist time I just dropped in and sat in the bar area the service was fantastic and attentive. The second time I made reservations and sat in the dining area. Complete different place. Service was not attentive at all and was difficult to get any service. The food was still the same amazing food as before. I would suggest dropping in and eating in the bar.

KSyoQVUMhQgUfpYgTHIKIQ.text: Very good food. Enjoyed it very much. Service was friendly and very attentive. Prices are a bit high. If you come hungry definitely order the full house and some small plates. Salt and Pepe fries were awesome.

photos.caption: Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of White Horse Oyster and Seafood Bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

jmzeQDSQWbZ3vbeRYKwVfQ.text: Don't pass this place up. It's a hidden gem on the Royal Mile.  Great location and fantastic food. If you like fresh oysters, crab, lobster...well pretty much anything in the sea White Horse has it. The service, wine selection, food and beer are perfect. I believe I had everything on the menu.  I even swiped some food from a neighboring table. A must eat in Edinburgh. Don't go changing, I'll see you soon!

ruKsrYDEv8A1QQ-abaDgKg.text: We stopped by to see if we could have dinner here due to the high yelp rating. We walked in and were half ignored for a few minutes. Finally, someone spoke with us and asked if we had a reservation, the answer was no and they went on their way. A few minutes later after we asked how long would it be again they went away and then came back and said if we wanted to wait over 2hrs they might be able to get us in before they close. There were seats at the front bar open and a seperate table at the front bar open, we asked if we could sit there and were told the empty table was reserved and we could not sit at the bar as that's for waiting customers to have a drink until their table was ready. We explained we were waiting customers and they would not allow us to sit. Two other people were seated their eating dinner and drinking. After that they just didn't acknowledge we were there so we left. All three of us independently thought that they acted very rudely, apparently don't want our money and a 1 star was in order. We walked past about an hour later to find the table at the front still open and chairs at the bar still open. I guess they have a right to refuse service and we have a right to write a review. I would suggest not wasting your time here unless you have a reservation.

SFq_4lDgZWmxAdc9vyitrQ.text: My mother and I were visiting on holiday, and had yet to have any seafood in Scotland. We were making our way down the Royal Mile and stumbled upon this place. We walked in and were greeted with smiles. It seems that they do most of their business off reservations, as we had to be quick because all the tables were reserved out after a specific time. We had fresh shucked oysters, a crab Scottish egg, heirloom tomatoes and cheese, mussels with pork cheek, and a lovely glass of champagne. It was the perfect pick-me-up after so much walking. The interior of the restaurant was dark and quaint - I loved it. For it being off such a busy street and the front door wide open, the inside was private and relaxing. I would recommend this spot to anyone visiting.

JLRcg02IJn7PSkMXG-TX-A.text: Stopped in after (unfortunately!) happy hour for appetizers & before-dinner drinks. Sat at a high top in the bar area. We were immediately presented with menus, food and drinks. We had chosen this restaurant bc of their oyster selection we read about. We chose a selection of 4 types with our drinks. They were all presented beautifully at the table with an expertly described description of all by a friendly bartender/server. They were fresh and delicious..... certainly worth another visit! We loved it all.

OIcXHSuF55-SvG5Zu0ojHA.text: Best octopus I've eaten outside of little ochi restaurant in Jamaica. Superb cuisine and attentive waitstaff. Can't say enough good things about the experience!!

7kvetjKVQG_xN667K9C2fQ.text: Fantastic oysters and the chowder was lovely. Great atmosphere and decor. Live this place.
